yuddhaya awasanwanawata akamathi aya yuda aparadha siduwuna yayi jathyanthara adhikaranayata genayamata chodana gonu kalath rajaya eeta niwaradiwa muhuna dun bawa adhyapana amathi susil premajayantha mahatha pawasiya.ee mahatha ese kiwe basnahira palath sabha manthri jagath kumara mahathage sanwidhanayen kaduwela aasanaye janathawata baddha palathuru pala ha elawalu pala bedadima ha tharunayan udesa riyaduru puhunu sahathika labadima wenuwen thalangama, baththaramulla samruddhi krushi niladharinge karyala shrawanagaraye di pawathi uthsawayakata sahabhagi wemini.soldaduweku ranawiruwaku bawata pathkale mahinda rajapaksha janadhipathi bawath, rata sanwardhanaya sandaha me wana wita waraya 05k idiwemin pawathina bawath guwanthotupala, mahamarga sanwardhanaya yatathe adhiwegi marga thanimen pahadili wanne niyama sanwardhanaya mawathata awathirna wi athi bawa yayi da amathiwaraya kiwe ya.basnahira palath krushikarma, gowijana sanwardhana, sulu warimarga karmantha ha parisara amathya udaya gammanpila mahatha basnahira palathe janathawa wagawata yomu kirime upakramayak lesa pala bedadima hungak wadagath.
jiwithetama harima apuru athdakim godak ekkasu karaganna labichcha kalayak thama eeka.

telinatya pradarshanaya sandaha rupawahini nalika wetha idiripath kirimedi eewaye gunathmakabhawaya randawa ganime kramawedayak sakasima kerehi janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathage awadhanaya yomu kere.me sambandhayen awadhanaya yomu kerune kalakaruwan muhuna di athi gatalu sambandhayen araliyagaha mandirayedi pereda (06) pawathi sakachchawakadiya.wiwidha kshethrayanhi niyuthu kalakaruwan thama katayuthu karagena yamedi muhuna dena gatalu saha poduwe kalakaruwanta muhuna pamata siduwa athi gatalu pilibandawada mehidi janadhipathithumage awadhanayata yomu kerina.telinatya prabala lesa samajagathawa athi bawin in labadena paniwudaya ayahapath wuwahoth shri lankiya samajayata sanskruthiyata ha sadacharayata ahithakara balapam athiwime thaththwayak mathuwimata ida athi bawin ee sandaha awadhanaya yomu kirime awashyathawaya kalakaruwo mehidi penwa dunha.telinatya nirmanakaruwan thaththwayen usas nirmana sandaha pelambaawime awashyathawayada mehidi penwa dun janadhipathithuma ee sandaha rupawahini nalika sathuwa pawathina wagakima pilibandawada karunu penwa dunneya.

eheyin, danata pawathna samanya prathipaththi wathathawaranaya mulika washayenma nawa rajaya mangin prakashayata pathkarana lada pirisidu paripalanayak athikirimata prajathanthrawadaya prathishtapanaya ha sampath prayojanayata ganimedi karyakshamathawaya prawardhanaya sandaha tharangakarithwaye aarthika wasi yatathe "samajiya washayen tharangakari welandapala" kramaya mangin pahadiliwa dakwa athi aarthika kramopaya kerehi mulika washayen wishwasaya thaba rata sighren ihala madhyama aadayam thaththwayata genaeemata sakasi thibenawa. 2030 nyaya pathraya sarthaka lesa aarambha kirima sandaha shri lankawa sathuwa wasidayaka ha sthawara deshapalana nayakathwayak menma manawa ha aarthika wibhawayak athi bawata mama wishwasa karanawa.
